name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accessibility Skip Link Menu with Focus

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool will inject a skip link onto the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creates a skiplink for accessibility

Instructions:
* This page will inject a skip link onto all pages.
* It will dynamically scan for landmarks and headings and place them into the menu.
* The skip link will highlight the element and move it into focus.

What's New:
We added a youtube video and a feedback survey in the popup.
